channel.title: Beginner that needs help please?
channel.description:
Alright so, as the title suggests, i am a complete beginner, so i've found this nice 317 source/client that i want to use to learn on, but all of it is "encrypted" i guess you could say, i have no idea how to change is so that it's actual words, im sure it's something simple, but as i said, im a newbie, so can anyone help?
an example of what i am talking about is, my Alert.class file looks like this : ÃŠÃ¾ÂºÂ¾ 4 P  >  ?  @  A  B  C  D  E  F  G  H  I Ã¿  J Ã¿Ã¿Ã¿  K  L M N title Ljava/lang/String; line1 line2 titleColor I color1 color2 active Z closed open opacity x y extraX extraY <init> 9(Ljava/lang/String;Ljava/lang/String;Ljava/lang/String;)V Code LineNumberTable <(Ljava/lang/String;Ljava/lang/String;Ljava/lang/String;III)V getTitle ()Ljava/lang/String; getLine (I)Ljava/lang/String; StackMapTable O getTitleColor ()I getColor (I)I ()Z close ()V opening getOpacity isClosed getX getY SourceFile Alert.java % 6  !  "  #  $              Alert java/lang/Object java/lang/String !                            !   "   #   $   % &  ' Â¯   W*Â· *Âµ *Âµ *Âµ *Âµ *Âµ * ÃºÂµ *Âµ *(Âµ *+Âµ *,Âµ *-Âµ * Âµ *Âµ *Âµ *Âµ Â±  ( F    L Q  U  [  ` a % b * c 0  5 : ? E K Q  V   % )  ' Â¯   W*Â· *Âµ *Âµ *Âµ *Âµ *Âµ * ÃºÂµ *Âµ *(Âµ *+Âµ *,Âµ *-Âµ *Âµ *Âµ *Âµ *Âµ Â±  ( F    L Q  U  [  ` a % b * c 0  5  :  ?  E  K  Q  V   * +  '   *Â´ Â°  (     , -  ' 6    *Â´ Â§ *Â´ Â°  (   .   C /  0 1  '   *Â´ Â¬  (   !  2 3  ' 4    *Â´ Â§ *Â´ Â¬  (   $ .   C  4  '   *Â´ Â¬  (   '  5 6  ' "   *Âµ Â±  (  *  +  7 4  '   *Â´ Â¬  (   -  8 1  '   *Â´ Â¬  (   0  9 4  '   *Â´ Â¬  (   3  : 1  '   *Â´ Â¬  (   6  ; 1  '   *Â´ Â¬  (   9  <  = How can i change these symbols so that i can actually read it?

oh wow, i feel like a complete idiot, i havent done this in 3 years so yeah, THANKS MAN!

item.title: Beginner that needs help please?
item.dc:creator: @Death_Style Death Style
item.description:
@Death_Style wrote:

you need the .java file not the .class file

.class are compiled .java files

Read full topic
